titlepage.titleproper: Girl Scout Guides and Policy Pamphlets, 1925-1948
titlepage.subtitle:
A Collection in
Special Collections Ms2016-018

defitem.label: Processed by: Katie Britt, Student Assistant and Kira A. Dietz, Archivist,

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.
did.unittitle: Girl Scout Guides and Policy Pamphlets, 1925-1948

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Girl Scouts of the United States of America

did.abstract: The Girl Scout Guides and Policy Pamphlets includes a collection of ephemera, apparently collected by Bettie Barber, relating to the Girls Scouts of the United States of America. Dating from 1925 to 1948, there are camp pamhphlets, as roll book, and a book of policies for Girl Scouts.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from Girl Scout Guides and Policy Pamphlets must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Girl Scout Guides and Policy Pamphlets, Ms2016-018, Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The materials in the Girl Scout Guides and Policy Pamphlets were separated from a purchased collection of Campfire Fire Girls ephemera. The Campfire Girls materials were cataloged for Special Collections Rare Book Collection.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Girl Scout Guides and Policy Pamphlets was completed in January 2017.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The Girl Scout Guides and Policy Pamphlets includes a collection of ephemera, apparently collected by Bettie Barber, relating to the Girls Scouts of the United States of America. Dating from 1925 to 1948, there are camp pamhphlets, as roll book, and a book of policies for Girl Scouts.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The items in the Girl Scout Guides and Policy Pamphlets are in chronological order.

controlaccess.head: Corporate Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Girl Scouts of the United States of America
